text: 240 is a number. It comes after 239 and before 241. == In mathematics == * 240 is an even number. * It is a composite number, meaning it has more than two factors. * The prime factorization of 240 is: 240 = 2⁴ × 3 × 5 (which means 2 × 2 × 2 × 2 × 3 × 5) * The digits of 240 add up to 6 (2 + 4 + 0 = 6). * 240 is a highly composite number, which means it has more divisors than any smaller positive integer. * It is also a harshad number because 240 is divisible by the sum of its digits (6). * It is the smallest number that can be expressed as a sum of consecutive primes in three different ways. == In other areas == * 240 volts is a common voltage for electrical power in many countries. == Fun fact == * 240 has 20 divisors, which is more than many numbers smaller than it. * 240 is the sum of four consecutive prime numbers: 53 + 59 + 61 + 67 = 240
title: 240 (number)
